summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 TOYOTA CAMRY. THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING 15 MPH WHEN FLAMES EMITTED FROM THE DRIVER'S SIDE DOOR. THE VEHICLE WAS DESTROYED AND THE FIRE DEPARTMENT WAS CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE AND THE CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 84,000.  UPDATED 06/05/12*LJ   UPDATED 06/07/12 *JS
